pytorch_privacy.analysis.online_accountant module¶

class pytorch_privacy.analysis.online_accountant.OnlineAccountant(accountancy_update_method, ledger=None, accountancy_parameters=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class to perform accounting in an online manner to speed up experiments. requires an accountancy method to have an online method.

property privacy_bound¶
update_privacy(incremented_ledger)[source]¶

Update the current privacy bound using new additions to the ledger.

Parameters

incremented_ledger – The new ledger. Assumes that the only differences

from previously seen ledger is the new entries. This should be of the formatted ledger type. :return: The new privacy bound.
